name: Pipo vs Troll
description: Pipo vs Troll (Pipo game) is a small 3D adventure game. It's about a young man felt on a deep sleep and he can't wake up.  In his dream, he found himself on a lost world with full of creatures and zombies. He finally met a wizard who will go to help with to get out of this nightmare so he will be able to wake up.
